document_data.name: Firecam full-plate armor
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Firecam full-plate armor''' was the personal suit of armor of Sir [[Keldorn Firecam]]. It was designed specifically for him, so very few others could wear it.

It was a ''+1 [[full plate armor]]'' that granted the wearer to ability to [[freedom of movement|move freely]] through hindrances such as webs, as well as boosted resistances to effects that assailed them.<ref>
